flawed_nl_solution:

Sue returned 6/3 = <<6/3=2>>2 movies to the library.
Sue had 6-2 = <<6-2=4>>4 movies left.
Sue had 7+9 = <<7+9=11>>11 books after checking out at the library.
Sue has 11+4 = <<11+4=15>>15 movies and books combined.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
